txt_en: You can start all over. Everybody gets a second chance. Happy new year!
txt_cn: 新的一年，每个人都能拥有新的开始与机遇，新年快乐！

txt_en: You want to be with someone who appreciates you for what you are.
txt_cn: 你选择的人，应该发自内心地欣赏你。

txt_en: Every man has his breaking point.
txt_cn: 每个人都有极限。

txt_en: Falling in love with you was the easiest thing I have ever done.
txt_cn: 爱上你，是我此生做过最容易的事。

txt_en: For what it's worth, it's never too late.
txt_cn: 只要是有意义的事，多晚去做都不迟。

txt_en: Everyone likes the smell of fire on the first cold day of winter.
txt_cn: 每个人都喜欢寒冬里的火焰。

txt_en: Our future's in bright hands.
txt_cn: 我们的未来一片光明。

txt_en: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more.
txt_cn: 最好的爱情能唤醒灵魂，让我们一同奔向远方。

txt_en: I just live by the ABC's: Adventurous, Brave, Creative.
txt_cn: 爱冒险，有勇气，敢创新，这就是我的人生态度。

txt_en: A real warrior never quits.
txt_cn: 真正的武士永不言弃。

txt_en: Love is not love which alters when it alteration finds.
txt_cn: 爱是矢志不渝的。

txt_en: Look inside yourself and recognize that change starts with you.
txt_cn: 审视自己的内心，从改变自己开始。

txt_en: Our lives are defined by opportunities.
txt_cn: 生活因机遇而变得更加精彩。

txt_en: You're going to the top of this mountain, broken legs and all.
txt_cn: 残缺的身体无法阻挡你勇攀高峰。

txt_en: The job of your life is to know yourself.
txt_cn: 人生的重任就是探索自我。

txt_en: You have to decide what kind of person you are.
txt_cn: 你要自己决定成为什么样的人。

txt_en: Some of us may just have to find meaning in the little moments that make up life.
txt_cn: 生活就是在平淡之中追寻点滴意义。

txt_en: Love is not the problem. It's how you love that is.
txt_cn: 爱不是问题，问题在于你如何去爱。

txt_en: If we don't respect the past, it'll be harder to build our future.
txt_cn: 不尊重过去，就无法创造未来。

txt_en: The short, freezing days of winter give way to the urgent awakening of spring.
txt_cn: 冷冽的冬天将要结束，蓬勃的春天将要苏醒。

txt_en: Love is one of the most difficult things in life. Certainly the most beautiful one.
txt_cn: 爱情是生活中最复杂却又最美妙的东西。
